source.name: Unearthed Arcana: Subclasses, Part 1
source.author: Wizards of the Coast
source.description: Unearthed Arcana leaps into 2020 with four new subclasses for you to try out: the Path of the Beast for the barbarian, the Way of Mercy for the monk, the Oath of the Watchers for the paladin, and the Noble Genie for the warlock.
